snippet.title: PS Vita - Hatsune Miku: Project Diva F 2nd - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA F 2nd (初音ミク Project DIVA F 2nd) is an upcoming 2014 rhythm game created by Sega and Crypton Future Media for the PlayStation Vita and PlayStation 3. It is a sequel to Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA F.

The game is set to have a similar play style to its predecessor, Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA F, whilst featuring new songs, returning songs from previous games, and character modules.

New in-game mechanisms original to the game include sliding touchscreen notes, and double scratch notes.

The DIVA room also features various minigames that can be played, including a clapping game.

A total of 40 songs are confirmed to be in the game. As of present, individual songs that are confirmed to appear include:

New songs
- "Akatsuki Arrival" (アカツキアライヴァル) by Last Note
- "Spoofing Genga" (なりすましゲンガー) by KulfiQ
- "This is the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee" (こちら、幸福安心委員会です。) by Utata-P
- "Glory 3usi9" (グローリー ミュージック) by Nanou
- "Karakuri Pierrot" (からくりピエロ) by 40mP
- "Envy Catwalk" (エンヴィキャットウォーク) by Toma
- "Kowase Kowase" (壊せ壊せ) by ELVN
- "DECORATOR" by livetune
- "Two Breaths Walking" (二息歩行?) by DECO*27
- "Like Dislike" (スキキライ) by HoneyWorks
- "Nijigen Dream Fever" (二次元ドリームフィーバー?) by PolyphonicBranch
- "Erase or Zero" by Crystal P
- "Meteor" (メテオ) by John Zeroness
- "Hello, Worker" by KEI
- "soundless voice" by ひとしずく×やま△

Songs from earlier Project DIVA games
- "Romeo and Cinderella" (ロミオとシンデレラ) by doriko
- "Colorful x Melody" (カラフル×メロディ) by Team MOER
- "A Thousand Year Solo" (千年の独奏歌) by yanagiP
- "Packaged" by livetune
- "SPiCa 39′s Giving Day Edition" by Toku-P
- "Ura-Omote Lovers" (裏表ラバーズ) by wowaka-P
- "Paradichlorobenzene" (パラジクロロベンゼン) by Owata-P
- "Luka Luka Night Fever" (ルカルカナイトフィーバー) by samfree
- "Kokoro" (ココロ) by Travolta
- "Double Lariat" (ダブルラリアット) by Agoaniki
- "Musunde Hiraite Rasetsu to Mukuro" (結ンデ開イテ羅刹ト骸) by Hachi
- "Pair of Wintry Winds" (番凩 Tsugai Kogarashi?) by hinayukki@仕事してP
- "Miracle Paint" (ミラクルペイント) by OSTER project

Re:Create songs (with new PVs)
- "Cantarella ~grace edition~" (カソ夕レラ～grace edition～) by Kurousa-P (White Flame)
- "Mikumikunishiteageru [shiteyanyo]" (みくみくにしてあげる [してやんよ]) by ika_m
- "Melt" (メルト?) by ryo
- "World is Mine" (ワールドイズマイン) by ryo

* Stay connected *
LIKE on facebook: http://goo.gl/HNnq0e
Subscribe my YouTube: http://goo.gl/KBk9uu

* Hatsune Miku: Project Diva F 2nd Gameplay for PS Vita
